name: Technicats
description:
Technicats is an action shooter multiplayer game. Protect the Bright Crystal from waves of robot dogs invasion. Strategize with a friend to keep the dying Crystal Safe from the deadly AI.

  • Local multiplayer, 2 player co-op.
  • Full-action shooting with unique mechanics.
  • Fix the tower as you go.
  • Increasingly harder enemies overtime.

Contact Me:
